name: CEGC
description:
CONTROLS

Q | W | I | O add volunteer to specified room

A | S | K | L subtract volunteer from specified room

Play as the Volunteer Coordinator on the CEGC and abandon al hope of maintaining order. Manage your volunteers and try to stop the chaos from spreading - if you can!

Team:

Anna Prem
Benjamin Schwalb
Benjamin Wahl
Chelsea Webster
Monica Neddi
Mohammad Chegini
Raphaela Klein

Original minion design by Rares Cinteza
http://rarescinteza.com/cegcminions/
